title: Harvard Shuttle API
description: Provides routes, stops, and arrival estimates for Harvard shuttles.

title: Official Student Organizations
description: An official list of all undergraduate student clubs and club sports, including those run by PBHA. As of Spring 2017.

title: Research Opportunities in the Sciences
description: Research Opportunities in the Sciences is a database of comprehensive information about undergraduate scientific research opportunities. The database allows for searches on keywords, concentrations, location, purpose of activity, and much more. Rising seniors can also use this tool to search for funding for post-graduate research opportunities.

title: Database of Funding and Opportunities for Undergraduates
description: Database of Harvard-Affiliated Opportunities is a database of Harvard's extraordinary resources for supporting the undergraduate experience through fellowships and grants. The database allows for searches on key words, geographical location, purpose activity of such as study, internships, senior research thesis and much more. Seniors can also use this tool to search for funding for post-graduate activity abroad.

title: Course Enrollment Stats
description: Harvard undergraduate course enrollments for every semester since Fall 1999.

title: Financial Aid records
description: Financial aid statistics and breakdown for each school.

title: Admissions/yield info
description: Harvard's annual acceptance and yield rate since 2003.

title: Sustainability: Greenhouse Gas Emissions
description: Greenhouse gas emissions levels, year-over-year change, and goals since 2006.

title: Endowment stats
description: A graph of Harvard's endowment amount, return, payoff, and % of University revenue.

title: Archived course enrollment stats
description: Course enrollment statistics for every year dating back to 1999.

title: List of academic institutes
description: A directory of the websites of all Harvard academic institutes, e.g. the IOP, the Shorenstein Center, and the Arboretum.

title: Harvard graduate school tuition
description: Annual tuition at Harvard's arts, business, design, divinity, education, government, law, medical, dental, and public health schools for every year since 1985.

title: Harvard College Tuition
description: Harvard College tuition, broken down into categories, for every year since 1985.

title: Harvard College Tuition, Fees, Room, and Board 1985-2016
description: A survey of the costs that Harvard undergrads have to pay for the last 30 years.

title: Faculty and Staff demographics
description: A summary of all faculty and staff at the University broken down by school. Includes race, ethnicity, and gender stats. Information for every year since 2003-04 school year.

title: Harvard Faculty and Staff Diversity
description: Breaks down Harvard faculty and staff by race, gender, and other factors.

title: Harvard University Dining Services (HUDS)
description: Breakfast, lunch, and dinner menus and nutritional information for undergraduate and graduate dining halls at Harvard University.
comments: menus and nutritional information is presented on website and is not structured, open data (yet!)

title: Group Fitness Classes
description: Group Fitness offered at both the Malkin Athletic Center and Hemenway Gymnasium
tags: fitness, gym, group fitness, MAC, Hemmenway

title: Student Organization List
description: Student Organization List divided into interested categories

title: Harvard Land and Building Report
description: Annual report that includes data on current land and building holdings by Harvard University, as well as detailed descriptions of all potential construction projects and renovations requested in the next year.

title: Fringe Benefit Rates
description: Fringe benefits (FB) are employee associated costs such as health plan expenses, pension plan expenses and workman's compensation expenses, among others. These costs are expressed as a rate by employee class. The rate is the pooled costs of these benefits divided by the total salaries in each employee class. These rates are then applied to the applicable employee salary to represent the associated benefits for that type of employee.
tags: fringe benefit rates, pension, benefits, vacation rate, retirement, health benefits
publisher: Harvard Financial Administration Office for Sponsored Programs

title: Annual Financial Report
description: University's financial position and results for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2015
tags: financial overview, finances, Harvard Management Company
comments: Data from Harvard University, Harvard Management Company, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP

title: Harvard Business School Annual Report Archive
description: Report of Harvard Business School financials, initiatives, and achievements of the past year

title: HUPD Annual Security Report
description: Holds information regarding HUPD crime and reporting statistics for the past three years, separated by type crime or offense.

title: Harvard Annual Fire Safety Report
description: Contains information regarding fires and the injuries and damages caused by fires on Harvard's campus for the past three years.
publisher: Harvard University Environmental Health and Safety Department

title: HUPD Daily Crime Log
description: Contains information regarding all reports to the HUPD for a specific day.

title: Office for Sponsored Programs Annual Report
description: The Office for Sponsored Programs develops an annual report that highlights sponsored research data most frequently requested by our research community. It is a condensed version of metrics on sponsored expenditures, proposals, and obligations for the year ending June 30, 2014

title: Harvard Common Data Set
description: PDFs per year describing admission and student statistics and demographics.

title: Cambridge Parking & Transportation plan
description: Harvard parking inventory, transit time statistics, stats on primary vehicle of commuters, etc.

title: Harvard University's Course Catalog.
description: The searchable catalog lists over 8,000 courses offered at Harvard University from over 100 departments and includes course descriptions, faculty, meeting times, and links to syllabuses and textbook information. Searchable by calendar period, school, and keyword.
tags: Courses, course descriptions, faculty, syllabuses, academic offerings

title: Harvard GIS Data Layers
description: Architectural and geospatial data on buildings, accessibility, green space, hydrography, map labels, parking, 3D CAD models of buildings, etc.
comments: Must email the manager to order datasets.

title: Harvard Archives
description: The Harvard University Archives collects, organizes, preserves and provides access to a comprehensive record of more than 375 years of life at Harvard. From 17th and 18th century diaries and scientific observations to 21st century web sites, the Harvard University Archives�ˌ_�ˌ__�ˌ_�ˌ_ collections comprise over 51,000 feet of University records and related historical materials.

title: Harvard Directory
description: A tool to look up Harvard students, faculty, or administrators and access the phone and email of each.

title: LibraryCloud
description: Catalog metadata++ about Harvard Library's collection + VIA images + Archival items. Total of about 17M items.

title: Universal Harvard Events Calendar
description: A dataset that will carry events from Harvard. Harvard has several websites that maintain active calendars so this dataset will probably access the events from the api/by scraping off the websites.
publisher: Harvard Registrar, Harvard Gazette, Harvard Course Catalog

title: Free software for students
description: A step towards having a compiled webpage/pdf with links to everything that is free for Harvard students with both the HUID and @college.harvard.edu email address.
comments: Probably work on compiling this data because it's spread over a wide array of domains. More sources will be included as discovered.

title: List of Club Sports
description: Official list of all undergraduate club sports

title: Shuttle route and schedule
description: A poster containing a map of shuttle stops and a schedule of all the shuttle routes.

title: Racial Composition of Faculty
description: A visualization of the racial composition of Harvard faculty over time

title: Crime Map
description: A crime map created from Harvard crime reports

title: Harvard Crimson Word Clouds
description: A word cloud of the most common tags and authors on Crimson articles

title: HUDS Menu
description: Web app for viewing historical and upcoming HUDS menu info
